website_summaries.verdict: This audio monitor is waterproof, so you can use it in the bathroom or outside by a pool.
pros: Does a good job of blocking out all of the background noise except baby crying
Rechargeable battery with a long life
cons: The unit only includes one micro SD charger cord

customer_reviews.title: Horribly unreliable!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this baby monitor -- waterproof, stylish, simple -- but it just wasn't reliable. It would turn off without warning and I'd wake up alarmed to hear my baby crying and no lights on the monitor. Also, there is only one power supply, so you have to unplug the base unit every time you want to charge the parent unit. Stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Abell

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I found the monitor to be "finicky". In other words, it wouldn't always charge when plugged in, and I found that I had to plug it in just so, and not move it, in order for it to work. It completely turning on after only 3 months of use. I wish I could return it, but I bought it in April before the baby was born, so the window closed. I wouldn't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: T. simons

customer_reviews.title: "See honey, this is why we can't have nice things." will not be said if you buy this
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitor was definitely built by someone who has children. If you've never had children before, the reality is that things happen. Things break. Kids grab things, you accidentally drop something, you need to run outside, baby monitor drops into the sink, etc.. This was meant for parents, especially soon to be parents who might want to have more than one child, and would like to save money for the second one. This was very well built. I am very glad that we bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M

customer_reviews.title: ... except baby crying which = no static and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Blocks out all noise except baby crying which = no static and I love it... then again it puts me on edge without the static cause I’m not sure it’s working unless he starts crying or I pop my head in his room a million times to see if he’s awake which is my own problem and not a problem with the product .. it actually does what I was looking for in a baby monitor I just didn’t realize how much I relied on the static lol
customer_reviews.author: Ashley.D

customer_reviews.title: They work great, easy to listen in on my daughter clearly ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great, easy to listen in on my daughter clearly and has a wonderful range. I would recommend this product to anyone with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: i love the portability of this monitor
customer_reviews.text: i love the portability of this monitor. the sound is clear and it doesn't pick up a lot of feedback like our previous monitor. the range is well over what is quoted on the box and the durability is perfect since i often take this outside with me while the baby naps. this is a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ALI

customer_reviews.title: Works well for what it is. Nothing too fancy.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we wanted. Something that was just for us to be able to hear our son and his room. We didn't want one of the camera we really didn't care if I had a temperature and all those other gadgets that a lot of the baby monitors have today. It's loud enough two on the receiver end that my husband and I sleep with the fan on and you can still hear the baby monitor well. The last couple we have gotten the volume just going to go loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper#116118Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Must charge 17 hours before use.
customer_reviews.text: The supplied rechargeable batteries do not hold a charge even after charging for 20 hours. I replaced the battery with a non rechargeable battery in one unit and leave the other one plugged in to the wall outlet. This seems to work for the time being. The monitor does work otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Patti L

customer_reviews.title: Great baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. I like how there isn't any static noise. Sound comes through great all around the house. With it came with a second listening device so I didn't have to carry the one around with me between rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Stein

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me simple and they fit right nto the background of my baby's room. Was worried at first because of how quiet it thinking it did not work but now that I know it is just a quiet product it allows me to sleep better. I didn't want done 300 dollar video enabled device, for the price poinT this is simple yet effective!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited bc reviews seemed good but it doesn’t work! One of the two monitors doesn’t charge unless you’re holding the cord “just so,” the sound on it really sucks, and it’s just not worth the money. Going back to my $19 one I haven’t had an issue with.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Range is way beyond 1000ft.  Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars all the way! The BEABA monitors work incredibly well. The range works well beyond 1000 ft. I love that it blocks out all noise except my crying baby. The LED lights up when the baby is crying too. I also love that they are cool and sleek looking. I’ve already purchased another set for the babysitter.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: It will be great to use in the yard while she naps
customer_reviews.text: This will be used when my grand daughter stays here at nap time. No longer will Mommy have to bring their's from home. It will be great to use in the yard while she naps.
customer_reviews.author: JMCar

customer_reviews.title: Great for hanging by the pool while baby is napping ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to travel for vacation. So far they are working really well and have a long range on the wireless signal. Great for hanging by the pool while baby is napping and thankfully have kept working through splashing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this product. Works great and is affordable. I feel comfortable putting baby down for a nap while using these!
customer_reviews.author: Cwick

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far..
customer_reviews.text: The sound on the monitor is great. There is no static or cutting in and out like you get on the VTech monitors. I can actually sleep with this on. Don’t worry about there only being one cable included. It charges with a micro USB cable which everyone probably has laying around. If not they are cheap. It’s cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Simple and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It's simple, reliable, works great, and looks nice too. Exactly what I wanted. Better than any other monitor I've owned. Update: broke three days before my return window closed (3 months) and had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality, bad sound and terrible range. Hated it since the day I bought it. The wiring was faulty and keep disconnecting for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me because I work in the yard a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me because I work in the yard a lot and my wife has trouble walking and if she needs anything she can holler to me and I can hear her anywhere in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth F.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After about 2 months of gentle use they stopped working and it was too late to return. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Rimareva

customer_reviews.title: Simple and nice
customer_reviews.text: Very straightforward.nice design and great that it is voice activated but has to be close to catch sound and there is some lag in the detection.
customer_reviews.author: Client

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the
customer_reviews.text: No other sound except for when my DS calls. No interference whatsoever. Very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cendrillion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Clarity & Long Range
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for new grandson! Excellent clarity, longer range than most and extremely well made.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGal

customer_reviews.title: 3 nights no longer function
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 3 nights. Plug in unit will not stay powered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this monitor to help us care for my ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this monitor to help us care for my 90 year old mother who has become bedridden. It has worked well to help us hear her call for assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works VERY VERY well
customer_reviews.text: These work GREAT. My only feedback is that the LED lights are bright but we just added some dark tape over them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah & Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I've already dropped these a couple of times and they continue to work perfectly. They're extremely well built. I also really like that they're waterproof...just in case! They're very stylish, and have a great battery life. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chicago34

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and compact and the sound and range is great. I moved from a visual monitor to sound once my baby was 16 months. However, it should come with two chargers instead of one. It also stopped working all together less than two months. If the company can fix those two issues than I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: mama

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, simple and durable but I had to purchase 3 times to finally get one where the talkies would “communicate”.. I love that it’s water resistant since we often sit by the pool with my other children...
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Why is only one USB power adapter included? The same powder adapter is required to power the child unit or charge the parent unit. If you need to charge the parent unit while using it, you have to buy a second power adapter. For $60, you would think they could have included two! I will update this review once I have used the product more, but I can't believe none of the other reviewers have pointed out this flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Avery

customer_reviews.title: NOT WIRELESS!
customer_reviews.text: NOT WIRELESS! Great plug in unit but very deceiving product information. The child unit must always be plugged in to work and the parent unit takes batteries, this is not a rechargeable unit. Sound great and works fine but if you are looking for true wireless baby monitor this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Ierardi

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I never worked for me. If the parent monitor is not plugged it wont work. Batteries do not charge.
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two uses
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working with a very annoying recurrent beep, after just two uses. Very cheap for the price, kind of unreal actually. I received as a gift and threw away the return QR code, too, so my poor friend flushed $60 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Sigh- I wanted this to work well...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this monitor because when it worked it worked so well, but a couple months after it was gifted to us for our baby shower it broke. Now the monitor where we are supposed to hear our baby doesn't work. It's a shame but now we are in the market for a new monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Morrison

product_meta.title: BEABA Minicall Digital Audio Baby Monitor, 1,000 Foot Range, Shock and Water Resistant, LED Light Sound Indicator, Wireless, USB Charger, Rechargeable Batteries, Ocean
feature_bullets: 1000 foot range for use anywhere in the house
Extremely durable: shock resistant and water resistant
Silent mode: LED indicates crying, Digital sound: automatic tuning system
Integrated long-life battery (25 hours), USB charger
Silicone wrapped soft-touch, BPA, Lead & Phthalate free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars49 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
